name: Avatar
crew: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang
description: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

name: Inception
crew: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
description: A thief with the ability to enter people's dreams and steal their secrets is tasked with planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

name: Gully Boy
crew: Ranveer Singh, Alia Bhatt, Siddhant Chaturvedi, Vijay Varma
description: A coming-of-age story of an aspiring street rapper from the slums of Mumbai who sets out to achieve his dream of becoming a recognized artist.

name: Dangal
crew: Aamir Khan, Sakshi Tanwar, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra
description: The true story of Mahavir Singh Phogat, a former wrestler who trains his daughters Geeta and Babita to become world-class wrestlers against all odds.

name: The Dark Knight
crew: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart, Michael Caine
description: When the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham City, Batman must confront one of his greatest psychological and physical tests to save the city.

name: KGF: Chapter 1
crew: Yash, Srinidhi Shetty, Ramachandra Raju, Archana Jois
description: Set in the Kolar Gold Fields of Karnataka, India, the movie follows the rise of a young orphan, Rocky, who becomes a powerful underworld figure.

name: Raajakumara
crew: Puneeth Rajkumar, Priya Anand, Ananth Nag, Sarath Kumar
description: The movie follows Siddharth, a young man who returns to his village and becomes involved in local politics to fulfill his father's dream.

name: Lucia
crew: Sathish Ninasam, Sruthi Hariharan, Achyuth Kumar, Sanjay
description: The movie blurs the line between dreams and reality, following the story of Nikki, a man who starts experiencing two different realities after taking a new pill.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton
description: The Shawshank Redemption follows the story of a banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Penitentiary and forms a deep bond with another inmate while seeking his own redemption.
